short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can save your bookmarks smartly and easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Saver helps you to save your favorite sites locally.
It is very simple and easy to use.

Visit your favorite sites and just click the save button.

==============================
Main features:
✔ Save Bookmark Locally
✔ Add Bookmark Name
✔ Single Bookmark Remove
✔ Search Bookmarks
✔ Navigate to Page
✔ Clear All At One Click
==============================

Note: None of your information (history or bookmarks) are stored or kept anywhere else than on your computer.
